title: AskmeBazaar Leads the Way: Announces 'War on Fakes'
text:
Monday, October 19, 2015 4:38PM IST (11:08AM GMT) AskmeBazaar Leads the Way: Announces 'War on Fakes' Noida, Uttar Pradesh, India 
Launches an industry first initiative that invites buyers’ participation Announces a Zero Tolerance Policy on Fakes Rolls out the #WarOnFakes campaign online ​ AskmeBazaar.com, India’s fastest growing online marketplace, today declared a ‘ War on Fakes’ , the first-of-its kind in the e-commerce industry. It also announced that it will be practicing a ‘ Zero Tolerance Policy ’ towards fakes. The company will be running an online campaign on #WarOnFakes and has sought the support from buyers across the country to come forward in large numbers and raise an alarm in case of any counterfeit products being sold on the portal. It promises strong and immediate action. Speaking about the campaign, Mr. Kiran Murthi, CEO, AskmeBazaar.com , “We understand that fake products are one of the biggest deterrents to the growth of e- commerce industry, as they affect customer confidence. We, at AskmeBazaar, have decided to take an aggressive stance and go all out to eliminate counterfeit products with our campaign ‘ War on Fakes ’. We have set up a rigorous manual and automated quality check to ensure no new fake listings go on to website.” Added Mr. Murthi , “We are confident that with the support of our buyers, we will be able to eliminate fakes from our portal. We urge the online shopper community to join the initiative and raise their voice against any fake product listings on our portal. We hope to consistently listen to our buyers, improve and deliver a better online shopping experience to all our buyers.” This initiative has been designed to enhance the credibility of e-commerce so that the online buyers can go ahead and shop without worrying about the originality of the products. To read more about the campaign, please visit http://war.askmebazaar.com/waronfakes/ The campaign also invites shoppers to report counterfeit products being sold on any other e-commerce site and the company promises to take a strong, concerted and ongoing effort to get the same removed. About AskmeBazaar.com AskmeBazaar.com is India’s largest managed online marketplace. It is an online bazaar with many stores from across India where buyers can search, compare, and buy the products of their choice from sellers across India. Buyers can log onto www.askmebazaar.com , or call AskMe 0444-444-4444 to search for items, specials, shops, deals, festival offers, discounts and much more. They can choose from a number of payment options, order on voice and get customer support on voice to track their transaction for all their online purchases.
